item.title: Hugo的配置
item.description: 首先需要将 themes/future-imperfect/examplesite/config.toml 复制到根目录替换原文件； baseurl = "/" # 网站根路径，可以写成你后期站点对应的域名 languageCode = "en-us" # 网站支持语言 title = "Hugo Future Imperfect" # 网站标题 theme = "hugo-future-imperfect" # 网站主题 preserveTaxonomyNames = true paginate = 3 # 文章超出几篇后产生分页 disqusShortname = "shortname" googleAnalytics = "" pluralizeListTitles = false # Set the followings to true as part of your site SEO enableRobotsTXT = true canonifyURLs = true # [params] 下面的值将会构成模板里的 .Site.Params 变量 [params] # Sets the meta tag description description = "HTML5 UP theme, Future Imperfect with some extra goodies, ported by Julio Pescador.

item.title: toml文档格式的数据定义
item.description: TOML 的全称是 Tom’s Obvious, Minimal Language，因为它的作者是 GitHub 联合创始人 Tom Preston-Werner 。 TOML是大小写敏感的 # 表示注释 可以按照自己的意愿使用空格或者Tab缩进 先写一个 Hugo 博客/md文档的配置规范 +++ title = "标题名称" description = "" //副标题 draft = false //草稿 author = "么了" date = "2019-04-02" categories = ["笔记",博客""] // 设置分类，支持数组格式 series = ["A", "B"] slug = "url的尾部" tags = [] keywords: ["A", "B"] featured = "pic01.jpg" //外部索引图片地址用文件夹 /年份/月份/pic.jpg featuredalt = "Pic 1" featuredpath = "date" // 也可使用绝对路径 linktitle = "" publishdate // 定时未来发布的时间 type = "post" metaDataFormat = "toml" languageCode = "en-us" date = "2014-09-29T21:54:53-05:00" weight // 排序的权重，默认按时间降序 +++ Hugo 的 markdown 文件前置数据定义结构，支持三种格式的语法类型 例如： yaml --- title: "My First Post" date: 2019-03-26T08:47:11+01:00 draft: true --- toml +++ title: "My First Post" date: 2019-03-26T08:47:11+01:00 draft: true +++ json { "title": "{{ replace .
